Package fr.univartois.cril.approximation.solver

Class SolverContext

java.lang.Object
fr.univartois.cril.approximation.solver.SolverContext
public class SolverContext extends Object
The SolverContext class stores shared configuration settings for different solver states. It provides access to both the normal and relaxation solver configurations, allowing state transitions to retrieve the appropriate settings without creating direct dependencies between states.

This class is primarily used to facilitate smooth transitions between NormalStateSolver and SubApproximationStateSolver by providing the necessary configurations dynamically.
